attributes.action: Make medical insurance compulsory for foreign nationals visiting the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Data collected from Patrick Minford, Professor of Applied Economics at Cardiff Business School, Cardiff University.

See "You Tube"
attributes.background:
The UK tax payer subsidies foreign migrants to the tune of £6-7 billion a year to settle in the UK.(Education, Health Care, Dental, Housing & Benefit's)
The NHS is at bursting point and cant carry on treating all the worlds sick people for free.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you like the UK Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure whether you want to change the rules for visitors or for migrants. You can find out more about the current rules here:

https://www.nhs.uk/using-the-nhs/nhs-services/visiting-or-moving-to-england/how-to-access-nhs-services-in-england/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
